taskGroup.name: Query your models using VIATRA Query
taskGroup.intro: VIATRA Query is a technology that can be used to efficiently query EMF instance models in an incremental way. After completing the tasks, you will know how to create a VIATRA Query plug-in, how to use it, and where to look for further information. These sheets guide you through simple example that works immediately.

task.name: Creating a VIATRA Query Project
task.intro: This sheet describes how to create a VIATRA Query plug-in project from scratch.

task.name: Creating and Executing Queries
task.intro: This sheet describes how to create VIATRA queries.

task.name: Generating Code from Queries
task.intro: This cheat sheet demonstrates how VIATRA queries can be invoked from Java code.
